mapper.select: SELECT m.USER_NO, m.USER_NAME, b.BUSINESS_NAME, p.POSITION_NAME, m.PHONE, m.BUSINESS_NO FROM "MEMBER" m JOIN "BUSINESS" b ON m.BUSINESS_NO = b.BUSINESS_NO JOIN "POSITION" p ON m.POSITION_NO = p.POSITION_NO WHERE m.STATUS = 1 AND p.POSITION_NAME LIKE 'B_%' ORDER BY m.USER_NO ASC

SELECT m.USER_NO, m.USER_NAME, b.BUSINESS_NAME, p.POSITION_NAME, m.PHONE, m.BUSINESS_NO FROM "MEMBER" m JOIN "BUSINESS" b ON m.BUSINESS_NO = b.BUSINESS_NO JOIN "POSITION" p ON m.POSITION_NO = p.POSITION_NO WHERE m.STATUS = 1 AND p.POSITION_NAME LIKE 'B_%' AND m.BUSINESS_NO = #{businessNo} ORDER BY m.USER_NO ASC

SELECT m.USER_NO, m.USER_NAME, b.BUSINESS_NAME, p.POSITION_NAME, m.PHONE, m.BUSINESS_NO FROM "MEMBER" m JOIN "BUSINESS" b ON m.BUSINESS_NO = b.BUSINESS_NO JOIN "POSITION" p ON m.POSITION_NO = p.POSITION_NO WHERE m.STATUS = 1 AND m.USER_NAME = #{userName} AND ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY m.USER_NO ASC
